title: Race Winning Intervals Workout - Indoor Cycle Training
description:
Subscribe to GCN Training: https://gcn.eu/GCNTraining 

In association with Wahoo.

Matt Stephens instructs you through this fantastic workout session, Race Winning Intervals.

Subscribe to GCN: http://gcn.eu/SubscribeToGCN
Get exclusive GCN gear in the GCN shop! http://gcn.eu/8W

Ex-Professional Cyclist Matt Stephens takes you on a race winning interval session! Let us know how you get on with this tough workout.

Here is a link to the print out of this session you need it: http://gcn.eu/RaceWinningPrintOut
   
If you'd like to contribute captions and video info in your language, here's the link 👍  http://gcn.eu/8V

Not all exercises are suitable for everyone - there is no ‘one size fits all’ approach. As with any strenuous exercise, you should take into account factors such as your flexibility, strength and overall health to determine if an exercise is appropriate for you, and consult a doctor/physician before beginning a programme of exercise. Discontinue your exercise session immediately if you experience any pain, dizziness or discomfort. 
Partaking in training sessions following GCN's video instruction is entirely at your own risk, and Global Cycling Network, its partners and its affiliated companies cannot be held responsible for any injuries which may occur as a result of these exercises.

Watch more on GCN...
Behind The Scenes - A Day At Training Camp With Team Sky  📹  http://gcn.eu/skytrainingcamp
GCN Flanders Challenge - Wahoo Elemnt Bolt First Look  📹  http://gcn.eu/8i

Photos: © Bettiniphoto / http://www.bettiniphoto.net/ & ©Tim De Waele / http://www.tdwsport.com

About GCN:

The Global Cycling Network puts you in the centre of the action: from the iconic climbs of Alpe D’Huez and Mont Ventoux to the cobbles of Flanders, everywhere there is road or pavé, world-class racing and pro riders, we will be there bringing you action, analysis and unparalleled access every week, every month, and every year. We show you how to be a better cyclist with our bike maintenance videos, tips for improving your cycling, cycling top tens, and not forgetting the weekly GCN Show. Join us on YouTube’s biggest and best cycling channel to get closer to the action and improve your riding!

Welcome to the Global Cycling Network | Inside cycling

The Global Cycling Network puts you in the centre of the action: from the iconic climbs of Alpe D’Huez and Mont Ventoux to the cobbles of Flanders, everywhere there is road or pavé, world-class racing and pro riders, we will be there bringing you action, analysis and unparalleled access every week, every month, and every year. comments: Let us know how you find this session! 👇

I’ve been doing this workout for years, but on a basic indoor spinning bike (where I was guessing effort based on heart rate and gear). However, this Christmas I dropped a million hints to my husband (who blames you, GCN) that I wanted to upgrade to a wahoo smart trainer for my road bike. I was so stoked to get one and along with the wahoo app (which can act like an elemnt which toggles effort) it has totally opened up a whole new world of pain and fun. It’s been so awesome to go back through all these GCN workouts and work to be spot on with my cadence and effort. Thanks, guys!

GCN motto should be:

“The Ministry of sweat”

Yet another brutal session,absolutely brilliant,the GCN team never fails to deliver.
It does not matter 15min or 60min you will drenched with sweat at the end.
The GCN team have changed the lives of many people,both physically and mentally.
Please don’t ever stop producing these amazing workout sessions…👊🏽
I just found this channel and did this workout. OMG . I loved this!!!!  Instructor is outstanding and so is the music  ❤️❤️❤️

Matt Stephens, do you know how good you are doing this? Your comments on what the benefits are of your work out and the info you give on cycling and how it benefits the body is SO amazing and so good to hear while you are dying, and thinking of quitting. You ROCK, just loving your classes! Thank you so much!
